metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5637 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The restore_tqb_pixels function in libbpg 0.9.5 through 0.9.7 mishandlesthe transquant_bypass_enable_flag value, which allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write)via a crafted BPG image, related to a "type confusion" issue.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
